hero.title: Your Ideas Deserve World-Class Development
hero.description: We're the Brandenburg web development team that turns ambitious visions into digital reality. Whether you need a lightning-fast website, a mobile app that users love, or an e-commerce platform that converts—we've got you covered. No corporate fluff, just exceptional code and genuine partnership.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: We help you identify, explore and respond to new opportunities.

webDevelopment.title: Web development
webDevelopment.description: We specialise in crafting beautiful, high quality marketing pages. The rest of the website will be a shell that uses lorem ipsum everywhere.

applicationDevelopment.title: Application development
applicationDevelopment.description: We have a team of skilled developers who are experts in the latest app frameworks, like Angular 1 and Google Web Toolkit.

eCommerce.title: E-commerce
eCommerce.description: We are at the forefront of modern e-commerce development. Which mainly means adding your logo to the Shopify store template we've used for the past six years.

testimonials.quote: Three months after launch, our new platform increased sales by 340% and cut customer support tickets in half. The Grizzly team didn't just build us a website—they solved real business problems we didn't even know we had.

contact.description: We can't wait to hear from you.

about.title: Our strength is collaboration

team.title: The team
team.description: We're a 100% remote team spread across the globe. Delivering great work is our priority, regardless of where we are.

work.title: Our work
work.description: We believe technology is the answer to the world's greatest challenges. It's also the cause, so we find ourselves in bit of a catch 22 situation.

process.title: Our process
process.description: We believe in efficiency and maximizing our resources to provide the best value to our clients.

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: We work closely with our clients to understand their needs and goals, embedding ourselves in their every day operations to understand what makes their business tick.

build.title: Build
build.description: Based on the insights gained from the discovery phase, we develop a comprehensive roadmap for each product and start working towards delivery.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: About halfway through the Build phase, we push each project out by 6 weeks due to a change in requirements. This allows us to increase the budget a final time before launch.
